definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)

sentences.english: The cold-sensitive neuron was voltage dependent.
sentences.chinese: 該類神經元具有電壓依賴性。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, these neurons respond to primitive rewards, such as food and water.
sentences.chinese: 不出意料，這些神經元對食物和水等原始的獎賞反應。

sentences.english: Each person has one neuron that he is responsible for.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都有一個由他負責的神經元。
“神經元”這個詞是在1891年被引進的。
人腦約有一兆億個神經元。

sentences.english: The dendrites usually create a weak network of connections between neurons.
sentences.chinese: 樹突通常創造連接神經元之間的一種弱網。

sentences.english: The VTA is a nucleus in the midbrain where dopamine neurons are located.
sentences.chinese: 腹側被蓋區是存在多巴胺神經元的中腦神經核團。

sentences.english: It has been proved that NGB could protect the neuron from hypoxic injury.
sentences.chinese: 已有研究表明腦紅蛋白能夠保護神經元免受缺氧損傷。

sentences.english: The effect of acupuncture was observed on 12 nociceptive neurons.
sentences.chinese: 對12個傷害性神經元進行了針刺效應的觀察。

sentences.english: And the weight from hide layer neuron to output layer neuron were determined to use pseudo-inverse method.
sentences.chinese: 利用僞逆方法確定隱層神經元到輸出神經元的權值。

sentences.english: And the weight from hide layer neuron to output layer neuron were determined to use pseudo-inverse method.
sentences.chinese: 利用僞逆方法確定隱層神經元到輸出神經元的權值。

sentences.english: To investigate the protective effect of isoflurane on the oxygen and glucose deprivation(OGD) in cultured neuronal cell.
sentences.chinese: 觀察異氟醚對氧糖剝奪離體神經元損傷的保護作用。

sentences.english: These molecules are thought to exert toxic effects toward neurons and oligodendrocytes.
sentences.chinese: 這些促炎介質對神經元和少突膠質細胞具有毒性作用。

sentences.english: The relationship hadnt been found between SOM positive neurons and apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 細胞凋亡與SOM陽性神經元之間似無明顯相關性。

sentences.english: Neure density in cerebral cortex and hippocampi was analyzed with pathological graphics context analysis system.
sentences.chinese: 病理圖文分析系統檢測大腦皮質及海馬神經元密度。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of lysosome in spinal cultured neurons.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討培養脊髓神經元中溶酶體的影響因素。

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
